snippet.title: Misc. A Tiny Tale - Indie Game Trailer
snippet.description:
An all NEW demo of Misc is out now - Wishlsit on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1308940/Misc_A_Tiny_Tale/

It's a great day for an adventure! Experience a heartfelt adventure with Buddy and Bagboy, two tiny robots made from miscellaneous items. Hop through each chapter meeting a quirky cast of characters - all while collecting cogs and items to help bots around you. 

"We're Miscellaneous" feat. RAYM
from "Misc. A Tiny Tale OST".

Release Date: TBA
Platforms: Nintendo Switch, Steam
Learn More: 
https://www.tinywaregames.com/misc-a-tiny-tale

Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/DHA59G5
Visit TinywareGames.com for all the latest! https://www.tinywaregames.com/
Like Tinyware Games on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tinywaregames
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/miscatinytale
Buy our merch: https://robaroba.gg/collections/misc-a-tiny-tale


#NintendoSwitch #UE4 #Switch #UnrealEngine #Misc #MiscATinyTale #WholesomeGames #GameDev #IndieGame #Steam
